remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 将行添加到控件之前，使用此方法填充单元格 。Use this method to populate a with cells before you add the row to a control. 向控件添加行后，其包含的单元格的数目始终与控件中的列数匹配，因此此方法不再有用。Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向控件添加行后，其包含的单元格的数目始终与控件中的列数匹配，因此此方法不再有用。Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful. 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
